subject: Add Phase 2 wallet features: deposit/withdraw pages and DB persistence
body:
- Create auth trigger for auto user profile creation on signup
- Update device.embedded.api.ts to persist wallet/device to database
- Add dedicated Deposit page (/wallet/deposit) with QR code and address
- Add dedicated Withdraw page (/wallet/withdraw) with amount/address input
- Add Deposit/Withdraw buttons to wallet page header
- Add Shadcn UI components: Select, Input, Label
- Install @radix-ui/react-select and @radix-ui/react-label

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
